title: JSON schema of Apify Actor output schema

actorOutputSchemaVersion.description: The version of the output schema. It's a required integer field with a minimum and maximum value of 1.
actorOutputSchemaVersion.x-intellij-html-description: The version of the output schema. It's a required integer field with a minimum and maximum value of 1.
actorOutputSchemaVersion.markdownDescription: The version of the output schema. It's a required integer field with a minimum and maximum value of 1.

description.description: Description for the output schema. This text is displayed in the Output user interface.
description.x-intellij-html-description: Description for the output schema. This text is displayed in the Output user interface.
description.markdownDescription: Description for the output schema. This text is displayed in the Output user interface.

title.description: Title for the specific output property.
title.markdownDescription: Title for the specific output property.

type.description: The data type of the output property's value. The schema constrains this to the string literal "string", which is a required field. The output value is always a URL, thus a string.
type.x-intellij-html-description: The data type of the output property's value. The schema constrains this to the string literal "string", which is a required field. The output value is always a URL, thus a string.
type.markdownDescription:
The data type of the output property's value. The schema constrains this to the string literal "string", which
is a required field. The output value is always a URL, thus a string.

description.description: Description for the specific output property.
description.markdownDescription: Description for the specific output property.

template.description: Definition of how the output value (a URL) is constructed. It can use text formatting with {{variable}} placeholders.
template.x-intellij-html-description: Definition of how the output value (a URL) is constructed. It can use text formatting with {{variable}} placeholders.
template.markdownDescription:
Definition of how the output value (a URL) is constructed. It can use text formatting with `{{variable}}`
placeholders.

properties.description: Definition the output properties of the Actor. Its keys are the names of the output properties, and its values are objects that define each property's schema.
properties.x-intellij-html-description: Definition the output properties of the Actor. Its keys are the names of the output properties, and its values are objects that define each property's schema.
properties.markdownDescription:
Definition the output properties of the Actor. Its keys are the names of the output properties, and its values
are objects that define each property's schema.
